Name: Sweet Dream
About the game: Welcome to the exciting arcano game 'Sweet Dream'! In the 3rd in a Row genre. Are you a lover of sweets and order? Then you're sure to come to us! So, get comfortable, adjust your attention and go! For victory! The game has 30 levels of varying difficulty. From the easiest thing - what will ANYONE cope with? Until the most difficult. Be careful! Okay! Playing for a while. Each level has a certain amount of time and combinations! You need to do everything to stay the winner! But rest assured, you will cope with the tasks, because you will be accompanied not only by exciting gameplay, but also by incredibly beautiful graphics and pleasant music! And of course, there are a lot - a lot of sweets! It's very pleasing. So, get comfortable, adjust your attention and go! For victory!
